articles.title: Children in sub-Saharan Africa hospitalised with Covid-19 dying at a higher rate than others: study - SowetanLIVE
articles.description: A study has found that children in sub-Saharan Africa hospitalised with Covid-19 are dying at a rate far greater than children in the US and Europe.
